title: Warning labels for sugar-sweetened beverages and fruit juice: evaluation of 27 different labels on health effects, sugar content, energy and exercise equivalency
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 230

Author(s): C. Miller, K. Ettridge, S. Pettigrew, G. Wittert, J. Coveney, M. Wakefield, D. Roder, S. Durkin, J. Martin, E. Kay, J. Dono
